subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: •  Wear Bulky Items: Wear bulky items like coats or boots during travel to save suitcase  space.  •  Pack a Day Bag: Bring a small day bag for daily excursions.  •  Leave Room for Souvenirs: Leave extra space or bring a foldable bag for souvenirs.  •  Additional Tips: Pack a small travel umbrella, a reusable shopping bag, and a  portable phone charger. Consider using a luggage scale to avoid overweight baggage  fees.
